Note: Art work is attributed to Frank Braugwyn. Date based on dates of 1st World War. Orientation: Vertical.
Description: Text says to make every effort inorder that the sailors and soldiers have plenty of pipes and tobacco. Contribute to the Sailors' and Soldiers' Tobacco Fund. Illustration is a sketch of many of the soldiers and sailors enjoying smoking their pipes and tobacco.
Digital Collection: Allied Posters of World War I
Publisher: Place of publication not identified : publisher not identified

Title: Sailors' & Soldiers' Tobacco Fund
